sentence.idiomatic: We estimate that the wholesale goods will be delivered on or about the 20th.

I brought some local specialties back with me.
After I graduated I stayed in the locality to work.
He's been there many times before, he understands the local situation comparatively well.

Elderly people can ride as a passenger on the bus for free.

All passengers,
This aircraft is scheduled to arrive at 4:20pm Beijing time. The local time at our destination upon arrival will be 3:20am.
